replies.bodyText:
This is a bug in the old xml-parser, where ws is captured as part of the xml-pi char* section. This is fixed in the new parser, now any ws is capture as ws.
Now we are hitting a different bug which is there in BLangNodes, where ws is not propagated to runtime - BLandNodes ignore ws when creating XMLs. @KavinduZoysa  shall we create an issue for this?
